definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: It looked around the page and saw lines all around.
sentences.chinese: 它環顧畫紙，發現周圍佈滿了線條。

sentences.english: She looked around her stripped room without emotion.
sentences.chinese: 她環顧自己那空落落的房間，沒有一點感情。

sentences.english: She glanced about the table to see the effect of this.
sentences.chinese: 她環顧一眼餐桌，看這句話產生了什麼效果。

sentences.english: The black dog was there, too, but the small tin soldier looked straight at the pretty paper house and at the beautiful dancer.
sentences.chinese: 小錫士兵環顧四周，發現他又回到了同一戶人家。

sentences.english: She looked round and saw )ett running.
sentences.chinese: 她環顧四周，看見傑夫正在奔跑。

sentences.english: Looking around Osaka, many buildings have been constructed or are under construction.
sentences.chinese: 環顧大阪，林立着許多架起的或尚待開發的建築。

sentences.english: I look around this room and I don't see many black faces who will become doctors.
sentences.chinese: 我環顧這間屋子沒有看到幾張將成爲醫生的黑色面孔。

sentences.english: He looked round upon us with a most agreeable smile.
sentences.chinese: 他帶着十分爽朗的笑容向我們環顧了一下。

sentences.english: When I standed up and looked around, just several people were still digging.
sentences.chinese: 當我站起來環顧四周時，只有幾個人依然在挖蚌。

sentences.english: However, on a cloudy day, looking around, one can only see boundless land disappearing into a sea of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 但遇陰天時，環顧四周，蒼茫大地，盡入雲海。

sentences.english: Patricia sipped her coffee and looked around at the one-room cabin.
sentences.chinese: 帕特西亞啜着咖啡，環顧着這個只有一間臥室的小屋。

sentences.english: When the sky is overcast, the horizon disappears into a sea of cloud.
sentences.chinese: 但與天陰時，環顧四周，蒼茫大地，盡入雲海。

sentences.english: When the sky is overcast, the horizon disappears into a sea of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 但遇天陰時，環顧四周，蒼茫大地，盡入雲海。

sentences.english: If you look around there, almost nobody is homeless.
sentences.chinese: 如果你環顧四周，幾乎無人流浪。

sentences.english: Anderson lit the oil-lamp and looked round.
sentences.chinese: 安得森先生點亮油燈，環顧四周看了看。

sentences.english: PreSchool-Grade 1-Suzy Goose looks around and wishes she could be different.
sentences.chinese: 學齡前級1蘇西鵝環顧四周，並希望她可以是不同的。
